game.name: Tic Tac Tier!
game.history: Tic Tac Tier! history here...to be filled in...
game.board: The standard Tic Tac Tier! board is a 3x3 grid of squares. Starting position: Nothing on the board.
game.pieces: There are two types of pieces, X's (player 1) and O's (player 2).
game.tomove: Each player takes turns making one valid move. Valid Moves: Choose an empty position to place your piece in.
game.towin: Be the first player to get three of your pieces (either X or O) in a row, either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. 3-in-a-row WINS.
game.rules: Whoever is X goes first. The players alternate making legal moves.

variant.name: Misere
variant.description: Force the opponent to get three of their pieces (either X or O) in a row, either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.
